metadata.Title: CVE-2013-0342 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description: The CreateID function in packet.py in pyrad before 2.1 uses sequential packet IDs, which makes it easier for remote attackers to spoof packets by predicting the next ID, a different vulnerability than CVE-2013-0294.

criterions.comment: pyrad package in impish is affected and needs fixing.
